Method Detail

getAllCountries

public java.util.List getAllCountries(java.util.Locale locale)
Provides the list of all ICountries in the given Locale.

Parameters:
locale - The Locale for which the records are intended
Returns:
The list of all countries in the given Locale

getFilteredCountries

public java.util.List getFilteredCountries(java.lang.String name,
                                           java.lang.String code,
                                           java.util.Locale locale)
Provides a list of ICountries in the given Locale with name and code starting with the corresponding parameters. A null or empty String in the parameter is interpreted as no filtering on that parameter.

Parameters:
name - beginning of the name of the requested records
code - beginning of the code of the requested records
locale - the Locale for which the records are intended
Returns:
the list of Country objects matching with parameters in the given Locale

getCountry

public Country getCountry(java.lang.String code,
                          java.util.Locale locale)
Get a Country object following the parameters.

Parameters:
code - the code of the requested country
locale - the locale to use for searching the country
Returns:
the Country object corresponding on the parameters
